sentences.en: Anecdotal evidence suggests that sales in Europe have slipped.
sentences.cn: 传闻有证据表明欧洲的销售量已经下滑。

sentences.en: Any action on the basis of such fragmentary evidence would be foolish.
sentences.cn: 基于如此不完整的证据采取的任何行动都是愚蠢的。

sentences.en: At present we have no evidence of life on other planets.
sentences.cn: 目前我们还没有其他行星上存在生命的证据。

sentences.en: Cabin crew have been giving evidence at the M1 aircrash enquiry.
sentences.cn: 机舱人员一直在为M1空难调查作证。

sentences.en: Fast work by the police in Birmingham had started producing circumstantial evidence.
sentences.cn: 快速开展工作的伯明翰警方已经开始发现间接证据。

sentences.en: He based his conclusions on the evidence given by the captured prisoners.
sentences.cn: 他根据被俘囚犯提供的证据得出了这个结论。

sentences.en: He found evidence of mutated forms of the gene.
sentences.cn: 他找到了该基因出现了变异形式的证据。

sentences.en: I was asked to give evidence (= to say what I knew, describe what I had seen, etc.)
sentences.cn: 我被要求出庭作证。

sentences.en: It was early, and few pedestrians were in evidence on the city streets.
sentences.cn: 天还很早，城市街道上的稀少行人清晰可见

sentences.en: Murrow’s evidence was enough to convict Hayes of murder.
sentences.cn: 默罗的证词足以证明海斯犯了谋杀罪。

sentences.en: submitted the photograph in evidence.
sentences.cn: 呈送作为证物的照片

sentences.en: The allegations against them were made in sworn evidence to the inquiry.
sentences.cn: 在调查取得的宣誓证词中对他们提出了指控。

sentences.en: The bowlers at the eye of the storm were nowhere in evidence.
sentences.cn: 处于风口浪尖的那些投手不见了踪影。

sentences.en: The empirical evidence considered here is subject to many qualifications.
sentences.cn: 此处提及的实验证据有诸多限制条件。

sentences.en: The evidence of our eyes tells us a different story.
sentences.cn: 我们亲眼所见的可不是那么一回事。

sentences.en: The evidence was read out to the court in a dull monotone.
sentences.cn: 证据被当庭呆板地宣读了一遍。

sentences.en: The nature and availability of material evidence was not to be discussed.
sentences.cn: 实质性证据的性质和可用性毋庸讨论。

sentences.en: The sum of evidence points to the crime resting on them.
sentences.cn: 所有证据都表明该犯罪乃他们所为.

sentences.en: The volcano is still active, as evidenced by the recent eruption.
sentences.cn: 最近的喷发证明，这座火山依然活跃。

sentences.en: They realized there would be difficulties in discrediting the evidence.
sentences.cn: 他们意识到要揭穿这个证据困难重重。

sentences.en: This evidence supports their contention that the outbreak of violence was prearranged.
sentences.cn: 这一证据证实了他们的观点，即此次突发暴力事件是有预谋的。

sentences.en: We found further scientific evidence for this theory.
sentences.cn: 我们找到了进一步证实这种理论的科学根据。
